column5: Probably shouldn't put their company name on their truck. Blue pickup on the southbound 427 at 12:40 today.  Aggressively weaving in and out of traffic, not signalling a darn thing. And it was a "custom bait" company vehicle. Way to go buddy!    Making us all look good!
welcome to the GTA......and being close to Brampton you should be used to that lol
